transcript_chunks.text: here's so yeah he's gonna get up he's gonna forget about it so again remind we're here now we're at Chase Field we're down there amazing seats we're sitting over the seats we get to take you know you've been folding chairs I was like do I can I leave this chair here and Tim goes no cool Greg wants him for the Hendersons and I was like okay pull it up and I looked out and I see the tray of condiments I looked over at Tim and I was like here's the chair and Tim goes no no you have to carry the chair in an active of course Nick I'm tired stubbornness I go up and I walk off and I stop off I didn't even notice mattered my foot goes right into the mustard I'm wearing all white Reeboks and he grabs a napkin he bends down starts cleaning issue and as he's doing it his foot slides out of his pocket and lanes in the mustard he's like no it is not so I get all the way up to the top and I asked him I was like hey what are we doing with this chair the Cougar goes I don't know because I'm carrying
